local battle = 'game/systems/battle/'

---@class battle_path
local battle_path = 
{
    ecs = battle .. 'ecs/',
    ecs_helper = battle .. 'ecs/ecs_helper',

    fsm = battle .. "fsm/",

    battle = battle,
    battle_utils = battle .. 'utils/',
    battle_data = battle .. 'data/',
    battle_control = battle .. "control/",
    battle_components = battle .. "component/battle_components",
    behavior_components = battle .. "component/behavior_components",

    battle_system = battle .. "systems/",
    battle_step = battle .. "systems/battle_step/",
    battle_round = battle .. "systems/round/",
    battle_skill = battle .. "systems/skill/",
    battle_fsm = battle .. "systems/battle_fsm/",
    battle_render = battle .. "systems/render/",

}

return battle_path
